title: Eldritch Knight

Create 3 illusory duplicates of yourself that distract attackers. Each duplicate increases your Armour Class by 3.Whenever you successfully evade an attack, one of the duplicates disappears.10 turnsRange: 18m

Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.

Phantasmal Force
